Keuwlsoft IR Remote File (Version 1)
2023-05-14 11:54:26

new_remote(Remote 1,512,1024,1)
	add_button(426,88,102,6,8,1)
		button_text(GUN,41,,,,255,255,255)
		transmit_raw(38000,"7550,850,3800,900,1000,800,3850,850,1000")
	add_button(90,89,107,0,2,0)
		button_text(Surround,21,,,,255,255,255)
	add_button(304,175,90,3,6,2)
		transmit_raw(38000,"2700,800,500,350,550,350,500,800,500,800,950,350,500,350,550,350,500,350,500,400,950,750,950,400,500,350,500,800,500,400,500,350,500,350,550,350,500,350,950,350,550,800,500,350,500")
	add_button(197,175,90,3,6,2)
		transmit_raw(38000,"9000,4350,600,550,600,1600,650,500,600,1600,650,500,650,1550,650,1600,650,1550,650,1600,650,1550,650,1600,650,450,650,500,650,450,650,1600,650,1550,650,1600,650,1550,650,1600,650,450,650,1600,650,450,650,500,650,450,650,500,650,450,650,500,650,1550,650,500,650,1550,650,1600,650,1550,650")
	add_button(92,175,90,3,6,2)
		transmit_raw(38000,"9000,4350,600,550,600,1600,600,1600,650,1600,600,1600,600,1650,600,1600,600,500,650,1600,600,500,600,500,600,500,650,500,600,500,600,500,600,1600,650,500,600,1600,600,500,600,1650,600,500,600,1600,650,500,550,550,600,1600,600,500,600,1600,650,500,600,1600,650,500,600,1600,600,1600,600")
	add_button(422,286,88,7,5,0)
		transmit_raw(38000,"9000,4350,600,500,600,1650,600,500,600,1600,650,1600,600,1600,600,1650,600,500,600,1600,600,500,650,1600,600,500,600,550,600,500,600,500,600,1600,600,1600,650,1600,600,1600,600,1650,600,1600,600,500,650,500,600,500,600,500,600,500,600,500,650,500,600,500,600,1600,650,1600,600,500,600")
